sentences.en: A dispatch was sent to warn the troops of an oncoming assault.
sentences.cn: 发出一封快信,警告军队注意一场袭击即将来到.

sentences.en: Always expect an oncoming car with two wheels in your lane.
sentences.cn: 永远假设前方的四轮来车有两轮跨越过你的车道.

sentences.en: Always walk facing the oncoming traffic.
sentences.cn: 走路一定要面向驶来的车辆。

sentences.en: Did you stare into oncoming car headlights or blast your stereo?
sentences.cn: 你是否直视过迎面而来的汽车头灯或把你的音响开得震耳欲聋?

sentences.en: He crashed into an oncoming car.
sentences.cn: 他撞上了一辆迎面驶来的汽车。

sentences.en: He loosed off two shots at the oncoming car.
sentences.cn: 他朝迎面开过来的车子放了两枪。

sentences.en: He side - stepped to avoid the oncoming car.
sentences.cn: 他走到一旁以避开迎面开来的车子.

sentences.en: He threw himself into the path of an oncoming vehicle.
sentences.cn: 他冲入迎面有汽车驶来的路中.

sentences.en: It was night and the oncoming light were bright.
sentences.cn: 当时天已经很晚了,对面来的车车灯很亮.

sentences.en: She was thrown from his car after it skidded into the path of an oncoming car.
sentences.cn: 他的车滑行到正有车迎面驶来的逆向车道后，她被抛出了汽车。

sentences.en: The fishermen were forewarned of the oncoming of the storm.
sentences.cn: 渔民预先得到了暴风雨来临的警告.

sentences.en: The glare of the oncoming headlights temporarily blinded me.
sentences.cn: 迎面车灯刺眼的光照得我瞬间什么也看不见.

sentences.en: The oncoming generation of students are seeking new goals.
sentences.cn: 新一代的学生在寻求新的目标.

sentences.en: The policeman stopped the oncoming traffic to let the children cross.
sentences.cn: 警察中断迎面而来的车流让孩子们过街.

sentences.en: We are looking forward to the prince's oncoming visit.
sentences.cn: 我们期待着王子不日前来访问.

sentences.en: You should watch the oncoming traffic when you are walking along a road.
sentences.cn: 你在马路上走要注意驶来的车辆.

words.tran_cn: 即将到来的；接近的；新兴的

trans.tran_cn: 迎面而来的，即将到来的
